query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «Poscia che Costantin l’aquila volse 2 contr’ al corso del ciel, ch’ella seguio 3 dietro a l’antico che Lavina tolse,
query.error: **English:** 1 After Constantine turned the eagle 2 against the course of the heavens, which it followed 3 behind the ancient one who took Lavinia,
query.result: 1 Setelah Konstantinus memalingkan elang 2 melawan arah langit, yang diikutinya 3 di belakang orang kuno yang mengambil Lavinia,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 cento e cent’ anni e più l’uccel di Dio 5 ne lo stremo d’Europa si ritenne, 6 vicino a’ monti de’ quai prima uscìo;
query.error: **English:** 4 for a hundred and a hundred years and more the bird of God 5 remained in the farthest corner of Europe, 6 near the mountains from which it first came forth;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 e sotto l’ombra de le sacre penne 8 governò ’l mondo lì di mano in mano, 9 e, sì cangiando, in su la mia pervenne.
query.error: **English:** 7 and under the shadow of its sacred wings 8 it governed the world there from hand to hand, 9 and, thus changing, it came into my possession.
query.result: 7 dan di bawah naungan sayap-sayap sucinya 8 memerintah dunia di sana dari tangan ke tangan, 9 dan, dengan demikian berubah, sampai ke tanganku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Cesare fui e son Iustinïano, 11 che, per voler del primo amor ch’i’ sento, 12 d’entro le leggi trassi il troppo e ’l vano.
query.error: **English:** 10 Caesar I was, and Justinian am I, 11 who, through the desire of the first love that I feel, 12 drew out from the laws the superfluous and the vain.
query.result: 10 Caesar aku dulu dan Justinian aku sekarang, 11 yang, melalui keinginan cinta pertama yang kurasakan, 12 mengeluarkan dari hukum-hukum yang berlebihan dan yang sia-sia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 E prima ch’io a l’ovra fossi attento, 14 una natura in Cristo esser, non piùe, 15 credea, e di tal fede era contento;
query.error: **English:** 13 And before I was attentive to the work, 14 I believed that there was a single nature in Christ, and no more, 15 and I was content with that faith;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 ma ’l benedetto Agapito, che fue 17 sommo pastore, a la fede sincera 18 mi dirizzò con le parole sue.
query.error: **English:** 16 but the blessed Agapito, who was 17 supreme pastor, directed me to the true faith 18 with his words.
query.result: 16 tetapi Agapito yang diberkati, yang adalah 17 gembala tertinggi, mengarahkan aku kepada iman yang benar 18 dengan kata-katanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Io li credetti; e ciò che ’n sua fede era, 20 vegg’ io or chiaro sì, come tu vedi 21 ogni contradizione e falsa e vera.
query.error: **English:** 19 I believed them; and what was in their faith, 20 I see now as clearly as you see 21 every contradiction, both false and true.
query.result: 19 Aku mempercayai mereka; dan apa yang ada dalam iman mereka, 20 kulihat sekarang sejelas yang kaulihat 21 setiap kontradiksi, baik yang salah maupun yang benar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Tosto che con la Chiesa mossi i piedi, 23 a Dio per grazia piacque di spirarmi 24 l’alto lavoro, e tutto ’n lui mi diedi;
query.error: **English:** 22 As soon as I set foot with the Church, 23 it pleased God by His grace to inspire me 24 with the lofty task, and I devoted myself entirely to it;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 e al mio Belisar commendai l’armi, 26 cui la destra del ciel fu sì congiunta, 27 che segno fu ch’i’ dovessi posarmi.
query.error: **English:** 25 and I entrusted my armies to my Belisarius, 26 to whom the right hand of heaven was so joined, 27 that it was a sign that I should rest.
query.result: 25 dan aku mempercayakan tentaraku kepada Belisarius-ku, 26 yang kepadanya tangan kanan surga begitu bersatu, 27 sehingga itu adalah tanda bahwa aku harus beristirahat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Or qui a la question prima s’appunta 29 la mia risposta; ma sua condizione 30 mi stringe a seguitare alcuna giunta,
query.error: **English:** 28 Now here my answer is directed to the first question; but its condition 29 constrains me to follow up with an addition, 30 so that you may see with how much justification
query.result: 28 Sekarang di sini jawabanku ditujukan kepada pertanyaan pertama; tetapi kondisinya 29 memaksaku untuk melanjutkan dengan tambahan, 30 supaya kaulihat dengan betapa banyak pembenaran

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 perché tu veggi con quanta ragione 32 si move contr’ al sacrosanto segno 33 e chi ’l s’appropria e chi a lui s’oppone.
query.error: **English:** 31 so that you may see with how much reason 32 one moves against the sacrosanct sign 33 and he who appropriates it for himself and he who opposes it.
query.result: 31 supaya kamu dapat melihat dengan betapa banyak alasan 32 seseorang bergerak melawan tanda yang suci 33 dan siapa yang mengambilnya untuk dirinya sendiri dan siapa yang menentangnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Vedi quanta virtù l’ha fatto degno 35 di reverenza; e cominciò da l’ora 36 che Pallante morì per darli regno.
query.error: **English:** 34 See how much virtue has made him worthy 35 of reverence; and it began from the hour 36 that Pallas died to give him the kingdom.
query.result: 34 Lihatlah betapa banyak kebajikan yang telah membuatnya layak 35 untuk dihormati; dan itu dimulai dari saat 36 ketika Pallas meninggal untuk memberinya kerajaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Tu sai ch’el fece in Alba sua dimora 38 per trecento anni e oltre, infino al fine 39 che i tre a’ tre pugnar per lui ancora.
query.error: **English:** 37 You know that he made his dwelling in Alba 38 for three hundred years and more, until the end 39 when the three fought for him again.
query.result: 37 Kamu tahu bahwa ia membuat tempat tinggalnya di Alba 38 selama tiga ratus tahun dan lebih, hingga akhirnya 39 ketika tiga orang itu bertarung untuknya lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 E sai ch’el fé dal mal de le Sabine 41 al dolor di Lucrezia in sette regi, 42 vincendo intorno le genti vicine.
query.error: **English:** 40 And know that he made it from the evil of the Sabines 41 to the sorrow of Lucretia in seven reigns, 42 conquering the neighboring peoples all around.
query.result: 40 Dan ketahuilah bahwa ia membuatnya dari kejahatan kaum Sabin 41 hingga kesedihan Lucretia dalam tujuh pemerintahan, 42 menaklukkan orang-orang di sekitarnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Sai quel ch’el fé portato da li egregi 44 Romani incontro a Brenno, incontro a Pirro, 45 incontro a li altri principi e collegi;
query.error: **English:** 43 Do you know what he made those illustrious 44 Romans do against Brennus, against Pyrrhus, 45 against the other princes and assemblies;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 onde Torquato e Quinzio, che dal cirro 47 negletto fu nomato, i Deci e ’ Fabi 48 ebber la fama che volontier mirro.
query.error: **English:** 46 whence Torquatus and Quinctius, who from the lock 47 neglected was named, the Decii and the Fabii 48 had the fame that I gladly mirror.
query.result: 46 dari sanalah Torquatus dan Quinctius, yang dari rambut ikal 47 yang terabaikan diberi nama, para Decii dan Fabii 48 memperoleh ketenaran yang dengan senang hati kucerminkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Esso atterrò l’orgoglio de li Aràbi 50 che di retro ad Anibale passaro 51 l’alpestre rocce, Po, di che tu labi.
query.error: **English:** 49 He brought down the pride of the Arabs 50 who crossed the Alps behind Hannibal, 51 the rocky slopes, Po, from which you flow.
query.result: 49 Ia meruntuhkan kesombongan orang-orang Arab 50 yang menyeberangi Pegunungan Alpen di belakang Hannibal, 51 lereng-lereng berbatu, Po, dari mana airmu mengalir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Sott’ esso giovanetti trïunfaro 53 Scipïone e Pompeo; e a quel colle 54 sotto ’l qual tu nascesti parve amaro.
query.error: **English:** 52 Under it, young men will triumph, 53 Scipio and Pompey; and to that hill 54 under which you were born, it seemed bitter.
query.result: 52 Di bawahnya, para pemuda akan menang, 53 Scipio dan Pompey; dan ke bukit itu 54 di bawah tempat kamu dilahirkan, itu tampak pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Poi, presso al tempo che tutto ’l ciel volle 56 redur lo mondo a suo modo sereno, 57 Cesare per voler di Roma il tolle.
query.error: **English:** 55 Then, near the time when all of heaven wished 56 to return the world to its serene state, 57 Caesar took it by the will of Rome.
query.result: 55 Kemudian, mendekati waktu ketika seluruh langit menghendaki 56 untuk mengembalikan dunia ke keadaan tenangnya, 57 Caesar mengambilnya atas kehendak Roma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 E quel che fé da Varo infino a Reno, 59 Isara vide ed Era e vide Senna 60 e ogne valle onde Rodano è pieno.
query.error: **English:** 58 And what the Var did from the Alps to the Rhine, 59 Isère saw and Era and Seine saw 60 and every valley that the Rhône fills.
query.result: 58 Dan apa yang dilakukan Var dari Pegunungan Alpen hingga Rhine, 59 Isère melihat dan Era dan Seine melihat 60 dan setiap lembah yang dipenuhi oleh Rhône.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Quel che fé poi ch’elli uscì di Ravenna 62 e saltò Rubicon, fu di tal volo, 63 che nol seguiteria lingua né penna.
query.error: **English:** 61 What he did then when he left Ravenna 62 and crossed the Rubicon, was of such a flight, 63 that neither tongue nor pen could follow it.
query.result: 61 Apa yang dilakukannya kemudian ketika dia meninggalkan Ravenna 62 dan menyeberangi Rubicon, adalah penerbangan seperti itu, 63 sehingga tidak ada lidah atau pena yang dapat mengikutinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Inver’ la Spagna rivolse lo stuolo, 65 poi ver’ Durazzo, e Farsalia percosse 66 sì ch’al Nil caldo si sentì del duolo.
query.error: **English:** 64 Against Spain he turned his army, 65 then toward Durazzo, and struck Pharsalia 66 so that the Nile felt the grief in its warm waters.
query.result: 64 Ke arah Spanyol ia mengarahkan pasukannya, 65 kemudian ke arah Durazzo, dan menyerang Farsalia 66 sehingga Sungai Nil yang hangat merasakan duka itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Antandro e Simeonta, onde si mosse, 68 rivide e là dov’ Ettore si cuba; 69 e mal per Tolomeo poscia si scosse.
query.error: **English:** 67 Antandros and Simois, where it moved, 68 he saw again and there where Hector fought, 69 and evil for Ptolemy then he stirred.
query.result: 67 Antandros dan Simois, tempat ia bergerak, 68 ia melihat lagi dan di sana tempat Hector bertempur, 69 dan kejahatan untuk Ptolemy kemudian ia bangkitkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Da indi scese folgorando a Iuba; 71 onde si volse nel vostro occidente, 72 ove sentia la pompeana tuba.
query.error: **English:** 70 From there he descended, striking Iuba with lightning; 71 then he turned to your west, 72 where he heard the Pompeian trumpet.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Di quel che fé col baiulo seguente, 74 Bruto con Cassio ne l’inferno latra, 75 e Modena e Perugia fu dolente.
query.error: **English:** 73 Of what he did with the following standard-bearer, 74 Brutus and Cassius bark in Hell, 75 and Modena and Perugia were sorrowful.
query.result: 73 Mengenai apa yang dilakukannya dengan pembawa panji berikutnya, 74 Brutus dan Cassius menggonggong di Neraka, 75 dan Modena dan Perugia berduka cita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Piangene ancor la trista Cleopatra, 77 che, fuggendoli innanzi, dal colubro 78 la morte prese subitana e atra.
query.error: **English:** 76 The sad Cleopatra still weeps, 77 who, fleeing from them, from the asp 78 took sudden and bitter death.
query.result: 76 Cleopatra yang malang masih menangis, 77 yang, melarikan diri dari mereka, dari ular tedung 78 mengambil kematian yang tiba-tiba dan pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

85 diventa in apparenza poco e scuro, 86 se in mano al terzo Cesare si mira 87 con occhio chiaro e con affetto puro;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 ché la viva giustizia che mi spira, 89 li concedette, in mano a quel ch’i’ dico, 90 gloria di far vendetta a la sua ira.

query.result: 88 karena keadilan hidup yang mengilhami saya, 89 memberinya, di tangan orang yang saya bicarakan, 90 kemuliaan untuk membalas dendam atas amarahnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Or qui t’ammira in ciò ch’io ti replìco: 92 poscia con Tito a far vendetta corse 93 de la vendetta del peccato antico.
query.error: **English:** 91 Now here marvel at what I reply to you: 92 afterwards with Titus he went to take vengeance 93 for the vengeance of the ancient sin.
query.result: 91 Sekarang di sini kamu kagum dengan apa yang kujawab kepadamu: 92 kemudian bersama Titus ia pergi untuk membalas dendam 93 atas pembalasan dosa kuno.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 E quando il dente longobardo morse 95 la Santa Chiesa, sotto le sue ali 96 Carlo Magno, vincendo, la soccorse.
query.error: **English:** 94 And when the Lombard tooth bit 95 the Holy Church, under its wings 96 Charlemagne, winning, came to its aid.
query.result: 94 Dan ketika gigi orang-orang Lombard menggigit 95 Gereja Suci, di bawah sayapnya 96 Charlemagne, dengan kemenangan, datang membantunya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Omai puoi giudicar di quei cotali 98 ch’io accusai di sopra e di lor falli, 99 che son cagion di tutti vostri mali.
query.error: **English:** 97 O you can judge those people 98 whom I accused above and their sins, 99 which are the cause of all your troubles.
query.result: 97 Wahai kamu dapat menilai orang-orang itu 98 yang ku tuduh di atas dan dosa-dosa mereka, 99 yang menjadi penyebab semua masalah kalian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 L’uno al pubblico segno i gigli gialli 101 oppone, e l’altro appropria quello a parte, 102 sì ch’è forte a veder chi più si falli.
query.error: **English:** 100 One opposes the yellow lilies to the public standard, 101 and the other appropriates it for himself, 102 so that it is hard to see who is more at fault.
query.result: 100 Yang satu menentang bunga lili kuning pada tanda publik, 101 dan yang lain mengambilnya untuk dirinya sendiri, 102 sehingga sulit untuk melihat siapa yang lebih bersalah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Faccian li Ghibellin, faccian lor arte 104 sott’ altro segno, ché mal segue quello 105 sempre chi la giustizia e lui diparte;
query.error: **English:** 103 Let the Ghibellines do their work 104 under another sign, for he who 105 always separates justice from himself
query.result: 103 Biarlah kaum Ghibellin melakukan pekerjaan mereka 104 di bawah tanda yang lain, karena ia yang 105 selalu memisahkan keadilan dari dirinya sendiri

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 e non l’abbatta esto Carlo novello 107 coi Guelfi suoi, ma tema de li artigli 108 ch’a più alto leon trasser lo vello.
query.error: **English:** 106 follows that sign badly; 107 and let not this new Charles 108 with his Guelphs strike it down,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Molte fïate già pianser li figli 110 per la colpa del padre, e non si creda 111 che Dio trasmuti l’armi per suoi gigli!
query.error: **English:** 109 Many times already have the sons wept 110 for the fault of the father, and it should not be believed 111 that God transforms his lilies into weapons!
query.result: 109 Banyak kali anak-anak menangis 110 karena kesalahan sang ayah, dan janganlah diyakini 111 bahwa Tuhan mengubah bunga bakung-Nya menjadi senjata!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Questa picciola stella si correda 113 d’i buoni spirti che son stati attivi 114 perché onore e fama li succeda:
query.error: **English:** 112 This little star is adorned 113 with the good spirits who were active 114 so that honor and fame would succeed them:
query.result: 112 Bintang kecil ini dihiasi 113 dengan roh-roh baik yang telah aktif 114 agar kehormatan dan ketenaran menyertai mereka:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 e quando li disiri poggian quivi, 116 sì disvïando, pur convien che i raggi 117 del vero amore in sù poggin men vivi.
query.error: **English:** 115 and when their desires rest here, 116 thus straying, it is necessary that the rays 117 of true love rise less vividly above.
query.result: 115 dan ketika keinginan mereka berhenti di sini, 116 dengan demikian menyimpang, maka sinar-sinar 117 cinta sejati naik kurang jelas di atas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Ma nel commensurar d’i nostri gaggi 119 col merto è parte di nostra letizia, 120 perché non li vedem minor né maggi.
query.error: **English:** 118 But in the measuring of our talents 119 with the merit is part of our joy, 120 because we see them neither less nor greater.
query.result: 118 Tetapi dalam mengukur bakat-bakat kita 119 dengan jasa adalah sebahagian daripada kegembiraan kita, 120 kerana kita tidak melihatnya kurang atau lebih.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Quindi addolcisce la viva giustizia 122 in noi l’affetto sì, che non si puote 123 torcer già mai ad alcuna nequizia.
query.error: **English:** 121 Thus living justice sweetens 122 the affection in us so much that it cannot 123 ever be turned to any wickedness.
query.result: 121 Maka keadilan yang hidup mempermanis 122 kasih sayang di dalam diri kita sedemikian rupa sehingga tidak mungkin 123 untuk dibelokkan kepada kejahatan apa pun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Diverse voci fanno dolci note; 125 così diversi scanni in nostra vita 126 rendon dolce armonia tra queste rote.
query.error: **English:** 124 Diverse voices make sweet notes; 125 so diverse stations in our life 126 render sweet harmony among these wheels.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 E dentro a la presente margarita 128 luce la luce di Romeo, di cui 129 fu l’ovra grande e bella mal gradita.
query.error: **English:** 127 And within this present daisy 128 shines the light of Romeo, whose 129 great and beautiful work was ill-rewarded.
query.result: 127 Dan di dalam bunga aster ini 128 bersinar cahaya Romeo, yang 129 karyanya yang agung dan indah tidak dihargai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Ma i Provenzai che fecer contra lui 131 non hanno riso; e però mal cammina 132 qual si fa danno del ben fare altrui.
query.error: **English:** 130 But the Provençals who acted against him 131 have not laughed; and therefore he who harms himself 132 by doing good to others walks badly.
query.result: 130 Tetapi orang-orang Provencal yang bertindak melawannya 131 tidak tertawa; dan oleh karena itu orang yang merugikan dirinya sendiri 132 dengan berbuat baik kepada orang lain berjalan dengan buruk.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Quattro figlie ebbe, e ciascuna reina, 134 Ramondo Beringhiere, e ciò li fece 135 Romeo, persona umìle e peregrina.
query.error: **English:** 133 He had four daughters, and each one a queen, 134 Raymond Berenger, and this made him 135 Romeo, a humble and foreign person.
query.result: 133 Dia mempunyai empat orang anak perempuan, dan masing-masing seorang ratu, 134 Raymond Berenger, dan ini menjadikannya 135 Romeo, seorang yang rendah hati dan asing.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 136 And then he moved his wicked words 137 to demand justice from this just man, 138 who assigned him seven and five for ten,
query.result: 136 Dan kemudian dia menggerakkan kata-kata jahatnya 137 untuk menuntut keadilan dari orang yang adil ini, 138 yang memberinya tujuh dan lima untuk sepuluh,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 indi partissi povero e vetusto; 140 e se ’l mondo sapesse il cor ch’elli ebbe 141 mendicando sua vita a frusto a frusto,

142 assai lo loda, e più lo loderebbe».
